definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: He had laid out his legislative agenda for an autumn special session.
sentences.chinese: 他還重排了秋季議會的立法議程。

sentences.english: He is due to be formally inaugurated in front of parliament on Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 艾哈邁迪內賈德星期三將在伊朗議會上正式就任總統。

sentences.english: Zargany has taken a leave of absence amid a dispute with the region's provincial council.
sentences.chinese: 薩爾曼省長在當地的一次省級議會上請假缺席。

sentences.english: People will pay for access to those in a way they won't for the latest episode of House or a reality show.
sentences.chinese: 人們付費來閱覽的並非是一段議會的插曲或現實秀。

sentences.english: We have hundreds of constituencies and the votes in each one ele …
sentences.chinese: 我們有數百個選區，每個選區通過投票議會選舉。

sentences.english: Parliamentary debate would supposedly give the game away.
sentences.chinese: 議會辯論可能會露出馬腳。

sentences.english: You know, councillor, the Manx parliament.
sentences.chinese: 您曉得，參議員，是曼克斯議會。

sentences.english: In governance, the chief must consult with the Council on all important matters.
sentences.chinese: 酋長在管理上的重大問題上必須與議會磋商。

sentences.english: Upper house of Britain's bicameral Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 英國兩院制議會的上院。

sentences.english: The wealthy landowner was accused of manipulating the local council.
sentences.chinese: 那個富裕的土地主被指控操縱地方議會。

sentences.english: I am Mira from the Pleiadian high council.
sentences.chinese: 我是來自昴宿星高級議會的米拉。

sentences.english: The house and its grounds are now run by Fingal County Council, but the Cobbe family still has access to the house.
sentences.chinese: 住宅和地皮現在由是現在芬戈爾縣地方議會所管理。

sentences.english: In UK the law derives its authority, expressly or impliedly, from Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 在英國，法律的權威，明示或着暗示地，來自於議會。

sentences.english: This gave us a seat in the European parliament for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 這也讓我們首次在歐洲議會中獲得了一個席位。

sentences.english: The next day Milosevic and the Serbian parliament agreed to them.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，米洛舍維奇和塞爾維亞議會同意了這些要求。

sentences.english: At this moment, the Supreme People’s Assembly has 687 deputies.
sentences.chinese: 目前，朝鮮最高人民議會有687個代表。
